verses.verse: Now Korah <S%H7141><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and On <S%H203><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth <S%H6431><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, took men <S%H3947><s%>:

And they rose up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, with certain <S%H582><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the assembly <S%H5712><s%>, famous <S%H7148><s%> in the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> of renown <S%H8034><s%>:

And they gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7227><s%>, You take too much upon you <S%H5712><s%>, seeing all the congregation are holy <S%H6918><s%>, every one of them <S%H3068><s%>, and the Lord is among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H5375><s%>: why then lift you up yourselves above the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H5307><s%>, he fell upon his face <S%H6440><s%>:

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%> and unto all his company <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Even to morrow <S%H1242><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> who are his <S%H6918><s%>, and who is holy; and will cause him to come near <S%H7126><s%> unto him <S%H977><s%>: even him whom he has chosen will he cause to come near unto him <S%H7126><s%>.
This do <S%H6213><s%>; Take <S%H3947><s%> you censers <S%H4289><s%>, Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and all his company <S%H5712><s%>;

And put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in it <S%H2004><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to morrow <S%H4279><s%>: and it shall be that the man <S%H376><s%> whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does choose <S%H977><s%>, he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>: you take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you <S%H1121><s%>, you sons of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%>, I pray you <S%H1121><s%>, you sons of Levi <S%H3878><s%>:

Seems it but a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto you <S%H430><s%>, that the God of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has separated <S%H914><s%> you from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to bring you near <S%H7126><s%> to himself to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister unto them <S%H8334><s%>?

And he has brought you near <S%H7126><s%> to him <S%H251><s%>, and all your brothers the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with you <S%H1245><s%>: and seek you the priesthood also <S%H3550><s%>?

For which cause <S%H3651><s%> both you and all your company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and what is Aaron <S%H175><s%>, that you murmur against him <S%H3885><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>: which said <S%H559><s%>, We will not come up <S%H5927><s%>:

Is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> you have brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> us in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, except you make <S%H8323><s%> yourself altogether <S%H8323><s%> a prince over us <S%H8323><s%>?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> you have not brought <S%H935><s%> us into a land <S%H776><s%> that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, or given <S%H5414><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards <S%H3754><s%>: will you put out <S%H5365><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%>? we will not come up <S%H5927><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Respect <S%H6437><s%> not you their offering <S%H4503><s%>: I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> one <S%H259><s%> donkey <S%H2543><s%> from them <S%H7489><s%>, neither have I hurt one of them <S%H259><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Be you and all your company <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you <S%H175><s%>, and they, and Aaron, to morrow <S%H4279><s%>:

And take <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> in them <S%H7126><s%>, and bring you before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>; you also <S%H175><s%>, and Aaron, each <S%H376><s%> of you his censer <S%H4289><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them <S%H7760><s%>, and laid incense <S%H7004><s%> on it <S%H5975><s%>, and stood in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>.

And Korah <S%H7141><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against them unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Separate <S%H914><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment <S%H7281><s%>.

And they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O God <S%H410><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%>, and will you be angry <S%H7107><s%> with all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>?
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Get you away <S%H5927><s%> from around <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>; and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H3212><s%> him <S%H310><s%>.

And he spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Depart <S%H5493><s%>, I pray you <S%H168><s%>, from the tents of these wicked <S%H7563><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing of theirs <S%H5595><s%>, lest you be consumed in all their sins <S%H2403><s%>.

So they went away <S%H5927><s%> from the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, on every side <S%H5439><s%>: and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%>, and stood <S%H5324><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents <S%H168><s%>, and their wives <S%H802><s%>, and their sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their little sons <S%H2945><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Hereby you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> all these works <S%H4639><s%>; for I have not done them of my own mind <S%H3820><s%>.

If these men die <S%H4191><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>, or if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> after the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>; then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not sent me <S%H7971><s%>.

But if the Lord <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> a new thing <S%H1278><s%>, and the earth <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallow them up <S%H1104><s%>, with all that appertain unto them <S%H3381><s%>, and they go down quick <S%H2416><s%> into the pit <S%H7585><s%>; then you shall understand <S%H3045><s%> that these men <S%H582><s%> have provoked <S%H5006><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H3615><s%>, as he had made an end of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, that the ground <S%H127><s%> split asunder that was under them <S%H1234><s%>:

And the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%>, and their houses <S%H1004><s%>, and all the men <S%H120><s%> that appertained unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and all their goods <S%H7399><s%>.

They <S%H3381><s%>, and all that appertained to them, went down alive <S%H2416><s%> into the pit <S%H7585><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> upon them <S%H6><s%>: and they perished from among <S%H8432><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

And all Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> at the cry <S%H6963><s%> of them <S%H559><s%>: for they said, Lest the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow us up also <S%H1104><s%>.

And there came out <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H7126><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, that he take up <S%H7311><s%> the censers <S%H4289><s%> out <S%H996><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%>, and scatter <S%H2219><s%> you the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder <S%H1973><s%>; for they are hallowed <S%H6942><s%>.

The censers <S%H4289><s%> of these sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own souls <S%H5315><s%>, let them make <S%H6213><s%> them broad <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: for they offered <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, therefore they are hallowed <S%H6942><s%>: and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the bronze <S%H5178><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>, with which they that were burnt <S%H8313><s%> had offered <S%H7126><s%>; and they were made broad <S%H7554><s%> plates for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>:

To be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that <S%H834><s%> no stranger <S%H376><s%>, which is not of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, come near <S%H7126><s%> to offer <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; that he be not as Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and as his company <S%H5712><s%>: as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to him by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

But on the next day <S%H4283><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, You have killed <S%H4191><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5712><s%>, when the congregation was gathered <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and <S%H6051><s%>, behold, the cloud covered <S%H3680><s%> it <S%H3519><s%>, and the glory of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Get you away <S%H7426><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them as in a moment <S%H7281><s%>. And they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> a censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in it from off <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> on incense <S%H7004><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> quickly <S%H4120><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them <S%H7110><s%>: for there is wrath gone out <S%H3318><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; the plague <S%H5063><s%> is begun <S%H2490><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation <S%H6951><s%>; and <S%H5063><s%>, behold, the plague was begun <S%H2490><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>: and he put <S%H5414><s%> on incense <S%H7004><s%>, and made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>.
And he stood <S%H5975><s%> between the dead <S%H4191><s%> and the living <S%H2416><s%>; and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%>.

Now they that died <S%H4191><s%> in the plague <S%H4046><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, beside them that died <S%H4191><s%> about the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%>.
